mail.subject: Your Cairn.info account has been created.
mail.body:
Sir/Madam,
Your Cairn.info account has now been set up. Here are your signing-in details: Login: [TO] Password: (your chosen password).
If you require help of any kind, please go to our client service system using the contact form at http://www.cairn-int.info/contact.php. You may also find answers to your questions in our online help pages at http://www.cairn-int.info/help.php.
Thank you.
